name: Soluspatium
description:
Shoot and Survive. 

        You've been dropped off on the military research vessel the USS Inventa, in hopes of recovering it and discovering why it went radio silent. In this First Person Shooter/Rogue-like, you must plow your way through the remains of a science experiment gone wrong while collecting what ammo and currency is left on board. Fear not if you fail, you'll be brought back to the beginning to try again, using what currency you collected to better prepare you for your next attempt.
